divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking out of school when i looked into the skyline. I saw a pulsatinglight, but thought it was mearly a building with its lights on, but as i lookedcloser i realized this was something i have never seen before. I though tomyself again, it has to be a plane, but the smooth surface, and golden colorthat shown through the night convinced me it was not. My body quaked, and heartpounded slightly harder as i watched as this sky vehicle raced away in its quickstream.
Summary: DISK LIKE OBJECT IN THE SKY
